short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See how design decisions influence where your audience looks first across any customer journey.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Dragonfly AI Extension allows you to measure and analyse the performance of any digital experience in real-time using Dragonfly AI's predictive attention algorithm. Simulate key user journeys, see how the design directs user attention attention then identify opportunities to improve alignment with your commercial and customer experience objectives.
